languages.text: "Он стар и норовист, потому требует бережного отношения, а не пыток невежественных мирян! С начала вахты ему нездоровится — мы ублажаем его священными маслами и окуриванием плат. Догма инфоврачевательного карантина запрещает трогать машины в таком состоянии".

"The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."
languages.original_text: "Он стар и норовист, потому требует бережного отношения, а не пыток невежественных мирян! С начала вахты ему нездоровится — мы ублажаем его священными маслами и окуриванием плат. Догма инфоврачевательного карантина запрещает трогать машины в таком состоянии".

The dogma of datarecuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines in such a state."

languages.text: « Il est vieux et irascible, raison pour laquelle il convient de l'aborder avec délicatesse, et non pas en le livrant à la torture aux mains d'une profane sans foi ni loi ! Il est souffrant depuis le début de ce quart, et nous nous efforçons de l'apaiser en lui administrant des onguents sacrés et en le couvrant de louanges. Le dogme de la quarantaine de régénération numérique interdit formellement d'interférer avec les augustes machines qui se trouvent dans un tel état. »
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vieux et irascible, raison pour laquelle il convient de l'aborder avec délicatesse, et non pas en le livrant à la torture aux mains d'une profane sans foi ni loi ! Il est souffrant depuis le début de ce quart, et nous nous efforçons de l'apaiser en lui administrant des onguents sacrés et en le couvrant de louanges. Le dogme de la quarantaine de régénération numérique interdit formellement d'interférer avec les augustes machines qui se trouvent dans un tel état. »

languages.text: «El espíritu es viejo y se enfada con facilidad. Por tanto, requiere un toque suave, ¡no la intrusión tortuosa de una bruta laica! Desde que comenzó esta guardia, el espíritu se ha encontrado inquieto, de modo que hemos intentado calmarlo aplicando ungüentos sagrados e incensando las placas de la gran máquina. El dogma de la cuarentena de recuperación de datos prohíbe toda interferencia con las benditas máquinas que se encuentran en ese estado».
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."

Desde que comenzó esta guardia, el espíritu se ha encontrado inquieto, de modo que hemos intentado calmarlo aplicando ungüentos sagrados e incensando las placas de la gran máquina. El dogma de la cuarentena de recuperación de datos prohíbe toda interferencia con las benditas máquinas que se encuentran en ese estado».

languages.text: “机魂已经老了，很容易发怒，因此它需要更加精密的手法进行访问，决不能让这个粗鄙的教外人士胡乱摆弄！自从这一巡开始，机魂就一直躁动不安，我们也一直在试着用神圣机油和香薰来抚慰这台伟大机器的电路板，减缓它的痛苦。根据数据恢复隔离教条，处于这种状态的祝福机器，不应受到任何干扰。”
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."

languages.text: 「この古くからいる霊は怒りやすい。だからこそ、慎重な取り扱いが必要なんだ。残忍な素人女性による拷問のような扱いは駄目だ！このウォッチが始まって以来、精霊は体調を崩しているため、聖なる軟膏を塗ったり、偉大なマシンのボードを検閲したりして、その苦悩を和らげようとしてきたんだ。データ復旧のための隔離のドグマは、そのような状態にあることが判明した機械の妨害を禁じている」
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."

languages.text: "Der Geist ist alt und schnell erzürnt. Es ist daher ein behutsames Vorgehen erforderlich, kein brutales Eindringen durch eine ungeschliffene Laiin! Es geht dem Geist schon seit Beginn dieser Wache nicht gut. Wir versuchen daher, sein Leid durch heiligen Balsam und Beweihräucherung der Platinen des großen Maschine zu lindern. Das Dogma der datenrekuperativen Quarantäne verbietet jede Störung gesegneter Maschinen in diesem Zustand."
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."

languages.text: "Ruh yaşlı ve çabuk parlıyor. Bundandır ki kaba saba bir avam kadınının eziyetvari müdahalesine değil, hassas bir şekilde yaklaşılmasına gerek duyuyor! Vardiyanın başından bu yana ruhun sıhhati yerinde değil. Biz de kederlerini yatıştırma maksadıyla kutsal özyağ sürüp kudretli makinenin devre kartlarını tütsülüyoruz. Veri şifası dogması karantinası, böylesi bir vaziyetteki kutsanmış makinelere yaşatılacak tüm huzursuzlukları yasaklamaktadır."
languages.original_text: "The spirit is old and quick to anger. It therefore calls for a sensitive approach, not a torturous intrusion by a brutish laywoman! Since the start of this watch, the spirit has been unwell, so we have been trying to soothe its woes by applying sacred unguents and censing the great machine's boards. The dogma of data-recuperative quarantine prohibits any disturbances to blessed machines found to be in such a state."
